attributes.action: consider encouraging a national television channel for foreign languages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all learn foreign languages but have little opportunity to experience them outside the educational environment. Would a national, or even a EEC, cooperative scheme be possible such that each country could offer a range of programmes in a foreign tongue? 
Say one night per week,with all of the programmes on that night taken from the 'donor' country's normal broadcasting in a common format, each night a different language.  Say children's programme early evening,news, soap, film, commentary, sport,travel info....
